title: Mathematical Literacy Awareness Improvement Module for Multilingual Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics concepts and entry-level professional field knowledge (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Designed around multilingual learners' perceptions and self-efficacy in mathematical literacy, with customized content reflecting the practical needs of professional practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can explain their literacy learning awareness in mathematical problem-solving processes with 3+ concrete examples
Learners can use self-assessment tools within the LMS to review and improve literacy learning strategies
Based on peer feedback, learners can analyze JEDI (Justice, Equity, Diversity, Inclusion) principle application cases and integrate them into mathematical literacy education

resources: LMS Platform (Including Discussion Board, Assignment Submission System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
